do_not_have_account: Don't have an account? Go to
name: Name
have_account: Already have an account? Go to
waiting_verify: We are waiting for you to verify your email...
waiting_desc: We have sent a reset link to your email address. Click the link in the email to reset your password.
six_digits: We have sent a 6-digit code to your email
terms_desc: These terms govern your use of our platform and services.
terms_glance: Welcome to Our Community: An Overview of the Terms
glance_sub: Here’s everything you need to know about using our platform.
glance_desc: we aim to connect individuals and organizations for meaningful contributions. Our guidelines ensure fairness, safety, and transparency for all users. Your experience helps create a safe and effective environment. By continuing to use our platform, you agree to these terms, designed with your success in mind. We’re here to help! If you have any questions, our support team is just a click away.
safe_respectfull: Your Role in Keeping Our Platform Safe and Respectful
safe_sub: Guidelines to ensure a positive experience for everyone.
safe_desc: Treat all users with kindness and respect. Harassment, discrimination, and abusive content are strictly prohibited. Use caution and ensure all shared content aligns with our community guidelines. Avoid spreading misinformation or engaging in fraudulent activities. Protect your data and keep your account information private and secure. Report suspicious activities immediately. Actively collaborate and communicate effectively with donors, campaign creators, and team members to ensure smooth operations.
payment_desc: We accept major credit/debit cards and bank transfers. All transactions are encrypted for your security. Fees, small processing fees support platform maintenance and operational costs. You will see this clearly outlined before confirming payment. Refunds, if you face an issue, a refund may be issued according to our policies. Refund requests must be submitted within 14 days of the transaction. Contact our support team to start the process.
account_sub: Ensuring compliance for a better community.
account_desc: Accounts may be suspended or terminated due to violations such as fraudulent activities, harassment, or repeated breaches of terms. Permanent termination may occur for severe violations affecting user safety or platform integrity. Account Restoration, for suspended accounts, you may need to complete specific procedures to regain access. Appeal for Suspension, if you believe we made an error, submit an appeal through our contact form, and our team will review it promptly.
fq_desc: Find quick answers to your questions.
q1: How do I start a campaign?
q3: How can I track support for my campaign?
q4: What happens if my campaign goal is not met?
answer1: We accept all major credit cards, bank transfers, and digital wallets.
answer2: You can view real-time support details in your campaign dashboard under the 'Support' tab.
answer3: If the goal is not met, the funds raised will be allocated to the campaign unless otherwise stated.
auth_error: An error occurred, please log in again

validation.only_letters_numbers: Only English letters and numbers are allowed
validation.domain_format: Please enter your domain in the format: https://example.Orphanssociety.com.

message.active: Your site has been created and is now active

message.reject: The site was created but has been rejected

login_description: We’re glad to see you again. Please log in to continue your journey of making a difference.
register_description: Be the change — whether you're spreading the word or giving your time.
register_agreement: By registering, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Use</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.
